resources.string: This application functions to convert temperature values from one temperature scale to another. Please enter the temperature value and select the temperature scale. Then click the \"Convert\" button
Enter the temperature value to be converted
The temperature value cannot be empty

Convert temperature from %1$s to %2$s

Input temperature value = %3$.2f %4$s 
Conversion result = %5$.2f %6$s

Berat badan: %1$s kg
Tinggi badan: %2$s cm
Jenis kelamin: %3$s

BMI: %4$.2f
%5$s

This application functions to convert temperature values from one temperature scale to another. You only need to enter the temperature value and select the temperature scale.\n\nThe temperature scale value can be set into four types of temperature scale, namely Celsius (C), Farenheit (F), Reamur (R), and Kelvin (K). The temperature scale will be based on two exact points, namely the lower fixed point and the upper fixed point. The bottom point indicates the freezing point, while the top point indicates the boiling point.
